subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick took advantage of a late caution flag, using pit strategy to outgun Kasey Kahne and pull off the upset in the Coca-Cola 600, which was marred by fan injuries.
snippet: Kevin Harvick took advantage of a late caution flag, using pit strategy to outgun Kasey Kahne and pull off the upset in the Coca-Cola 600, which was marred by fan injuries.
